Italy, Spain & French Riviera | Royal Caribbean | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Italy, Spain & French Riviera 7 nights | Rome to Barcelona Save up to 60% off the cruise fare for the second guest. Book by 30 November 2025. Deal Details Travel Dates 7 Sep 2026 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $2,169 per person Enquire Now Save up to 60% off the cruise fare for the second guest. Book by 30 November 2025. Set out on a 7-night European voyage departing from Rome (Civitavecchia) and sailing through some of the Mediterranean’s most captivating destinations. Explore the Renaissance treasures of Florence and Pisa, the charm of Santa Margherita, the glitz of Cannes, and the lavender fields of Provence before continuing on to vibrant Valencia. Your journey concludes in Barcelona, where architectural marvels and coastal beauty await. Along the way, be inspired by breathtaking landscapes, timeless history, and world-class culture at every stop. Pricing Interior Stateroom (Cat ZI) from $2,169* per person, twin share Ocean View Stateroom (Cat YO) from $2,628* per person, twin share Actual stateroom may differ from one shown Balcony Stateroom (Cat XB) from $2,928* per person, twin share Actual stateroom may differ from one shown. What's Included Accommodation Most meals & entertainment onboard Onboard Activities Fitness Centre Kids & Teens Club Fees and taxes Itinerary Ports and their order are subject to change at the discretion of the cruise line. Day 1 Embark Rome (Civitavecchia), Italy Day 2 Florence/Pisa (La Spezia), Italy Day 3 Santa Margherita, Italy Day 4 Cannes, France Day 5 Provence (Marseille), France Day 6 At Sea Day 7 Valencia, Spain Day 8 Disembark Barcelona, Spain Your Ship: Brilliance of the Seas Terms & Conditions Airfares & Transfers are additional. Pricing is correct as of 07 November 2025, is subject to change and availability at time of booking. Pricing is per person twin share and based on BOGO60 on Local & International Sailings savings applies to new bookings made between 12:01am (AEST) Saturday, 7st November 2025 – 11:59pm (AEST) Sunday, 30th November 2025. Offer applies to local & international sailings* departing from 7th November 2025 onwards. BOGO60 provides up to 60% savings off the price of cruise fare off the second guest booked in the same stateroom as first, full fare paying guest. BOGO60 savings applied to cruise fare at checkout. Experience the world differently.
